UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation

(string)

Search for locations with the specified name.

(string)

Search for locations with the specified city.

(string)

Search for locations within the specified health authority. See [this site](https://www2.gov.bc.ca /gov/content/data/geographic-data-services/land-use/administrative-boundaries/health-boundaries) for a list of accepteable strings.

(string)

INcommunityHealthServiceArea0..1string
(string)

Search for locations within the specified local community health service area. See this site for a list of accepteable strings.
